app.name: OpenJazz
app.long_description:
OpenJazz by Alister Thomson (http://www.alister.eu/jazz/oj/).
Default Controls (hold the Wiimote sideways): Arrows: move 2: shoot 1: jump A: switch weapons Home: Esc +: Pause
Special thanks to the developers of SDL-Wii for making this a breeze to port.
TODO: * Network games don't work yet.
Enjoy!
